_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:33:40 using v2.1
title: How have perceptions of inpatient rooms and ward cleanliness changed?
analysis_commentary: The overall proportion of patients in 2013 finding the hospital ward or room 'fairly clean' or 'very clean' remains consistent with 2012 levels at 97%. The proportion of patients who found the room or ward 'not very clean' or 'not clean at all' remains level at 3%.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Survey of Adult Inpatients and Survey of Outpatients
